refnamediv.refpurpose: Sets the given client-side property to the specified value.

refsection.title: Description
refsection.para: Sets the given client-side property to the specified value. Currently there is only one property: miter-limit, the maximum distance between the inner and outer points of a miter joint, proportional to stroke width (if miter-limit is set to 10.0, the default, then the maximum distance between the points of the joint is 10 times the stroke width).
